page-meta-tag-rule.description: Allow indexation & crawling of home pages by search crawlers.
Generate title tag using some custom text and the site display name.
page-meta-tag-rule.rule: The website with best products at low prices. | ${Site.displayName}

page-meta-tag-rule.description: Provide page URL in open graph tag.
Generate title tag based on available product name, product price range, product currency and site display name.
page-meta-tag-rule.rule: Buy ${Product.name} for ${ProductPrice.currency} ${IF ProductPrice.min EQ ProductPrice.max THEN ProductPrice.min ELSE ProductPrice.min AND('-') ProductPrice.max} | ${Site.displayName}

page-meta-tag-rule.description: Use page description from product if available. If not available fall back to generic 'Buy Product at Site.', e.g. 'Buy Black Single Pleat Athletic Fit Wool Suit at SiteGenesis.'
page-meta-tag-rule.rule: ${Product.pageDescription ELSE Constant('Buy ') AND Product.name AND Constant(' at ') AND Site.displayName AND Constant('.')}

page-meta-tag-rule.description: Allow indexation & crawling of Product Detail Pages by search crawlers.

page-meta-tag-rule.description: Product Detail Page Open Graph URL
Example rule to block indexation of color & size refinements by search crawlers.
page-meta-tag-rule.rule: ${IF SearchRefinement.refinementColor OR SearchRefinement.size THEN Constant('noindex,nofollow') ELSE Constant('index,follow')}

page-meta-tag-rule.description: Block indexation of all refinements in electronics categories (except brand) by search crawlers.
page-meta-tag-rule.rule: ${IF SearchRefinement.batteryType OR SearchRefinement.portableAudioType OR SearchRefinement.displaySize OR SearchRefinement.mediaFormat OR SearchRefinement.gpsType OR SearchRefinement.resolution OR SearchRefinement.tvSize OR SearchRefinement.tvType OR SearchRefinement.digitalCameraFeatures OR SearchRefinement.digitalCameraType OR SearchRefinement.digitalCameraPixels OR SearchRefinement.gpsFeaturesTHEN Constant('noindex,nofollow') ELSE Constant('index,follow')}

page-meta-tag-rule.description: Generate title tag based on available category page title or alternatively on category display name.
page-meta-tag-rule.rule: ${Category.pageTitle ELSE Constant('Find amazing products in ') AND Category.displayName AND Constant('' today | ') AND Site.displayName}
